name: Isodox Enigma
description:
Build the cities.
Meet the Isodox.
Find the Secret.

Set in the not-too-distant future, Isodox Enigma is an isometric City-Building Puzzle game where you place various types of city tiles in the best layout in order to maximize their bonuses and get the best score.

With four different city tiles, residential, commercial, industrial, and entertainment, you must place them in the best layout possible in order to take advantage of their adjacent bonuses. You will receive a set number of tiles, with which you'll build the best city possible.

In a future where an omniscient AI known as the Isodox provides for all of humanity's needs and wants, people no longer leave their support pods to interact with others or participate in the non-virtual world.

After a malfunction brings you out into the real world, you will begin to build cities and bring together the rest of humanity, slowly learning the secrets of what makes humanity unique. The time will come when you will finally meet the Isodox, and learn the true secrets that will set humanity free.
